entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:06 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -39.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 10:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -39.5°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -55
Dewpoint: -44.1°C
Wind: WNW 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h diminishing to 20 this evening. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 53 this evening and minus 60 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 60 in the morning and minus 51 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
